newsitem.title: USA: U.S. S&P 500 futures finish weaker but off lows.
newsitem.headline: U.S. S&P 500 futures finish weaker but off lows.

text.p: U.S. December Standard and Poor's 500 futures finished sharply lower, but off session lows, as the stock market braced for a possible correction to this year's big gains, traders and analysts said.
Various rumors on Wall Street spilled into the futures pits in the morning and contributed to the choppy, volatile activity that continued until the floor closed, they said.

"We just went down from 740.00 to 739.00 (in December S&Ps) in a matter of seconds," one trader said in the last 30 minutes of pit trade. "We've had heavy order flow, too, but we aren't getting designated as fast markets."
